subdisciplines.name: Faunal Analysis
subdisciplines.description: The study of animal remains from archaeological sites to reconstruct past human-animal interactions.

subdisciplines.name: Taphonomy
subdisciplines.description: The study of how bone assemblages are formed in the archaeological record, from death to discovery.

subdisciplines.name: Zooarchaeological Theory
subdisciplines.description: The development of theoretical frameworks to interpret zooarchaeological data and understand the relationships between humans and animals in the past.
